articles.content: Artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot company Haptik, a subsidiary of Reliance Industries Ltd, has acquired Buzzo.ai, a Mumbai-based conversational commerce start-up. The company did not disclose the … [+59 chars]

articles.title: Gold Prices Fall By Rs 5100. Check Latest Gold Rates In Your City On February 15, 2022 Here - India.com
articles.description: Gold Rate Today: For 10 grams of 22-carat of the metal, Gold price in Mumbai is Rs 46,300 and Gold Price in Chennai is Rs 46,950. In Kerala, Gold rate today is Rs 46,300.
articles.content: New Delhi: Gold rates in India fell by a whopping Rs 5,100 on Tuesday. The gold price in India for 22-carat gold per 10 grams was Rs 46,300 and for 24-carat was Rs 50,510, according to data on goodre… [+2422 chars]
